text: Hi there! I registered a package update that has been merged about 12 hours ago into the General registry. However, the package, `LocalSearchSolvers.jl` , does not update in my local env. Any idea why? FYI, I can checkout the new version just fine if I target the `#main` branch ...

elements.text: Hi there! I registered a package update that has been merged about 12 hours ago into the General registry. However, the package,
, does not update in my local env. Any idea why? FYI, I can checkout the new version just fine if I target the

text:
```(@v1.6) pkg> add LocalSearchSolvers@v0.1.8
   Resolving package versions...
ERROR: Unsatisfiable requirements detected for package LocalSearchSolvers [2b10edaa]:
 LocalSearchSolvers [2b10edaa] log:
 ├─possible versions are: 0.1.0-0.1.7 or uninstalled
 └─restricted to versions 0.1.8 by an explicit requirement — no versions left```
